Deleting into a nested block (was Radar 4056100)

The bug's symptom was that the visual result were two instances of the word "three", because the original was not erased. Resize cleared it up.
three
(repaint rects
  (rect 8 147 23 20)
  (rect 8 127 22 20)
  (rect 3 122 794 30)
  (rect 3 142 794 30)
  (rect 3 142 794 30)
  (rect 3 132 794 20)
  (rect 8 128 784 4)
  (rect 3 162 794 30)
  (rect 3 142 794 30)
  (rect 3 172 794 20)
  (rect 8 168 784 4)
  (rect 3 142 794 50)
  (rect 3 122 794 30)
  (rect -5 -5 5 610)
  (rect 800 -5 5 610)
  (rect -5 -5 810 5)
  (rect -5 600 810 5)
  (rect -5 -5 5 610)
  (rect 800 -5 5 610)
  (rect -5 -5 810 5)
  (rect -5 600 810 5)
  (rect 3 122 794 10)
  (rect 3 122 794 30)
  (rect 3 122 794 30)
  (rect 3 142 794 30)
  (rect 8 127 784 20)
  (rect 3 142 794 30)
  (rect 3 152 794 20)
  (rect 8 148 784 4)
  (rect 3 152 794 20)
  (rect 8 148 784 4)
  (rect 3 142 794 10)
